function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unprecedented pandemic outbreak","Impact":"High death toll, economic disruption, global recession","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, rapid response and communication","Technologies":"Digital health technologies, contact tracing apps, telemedicine","People":"Global population","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Highly interconnected world facilitating rapid virus spread","Impact":"Rapid global transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Enhanced global surveillance and monitoring, international cooperation","Technologies":"Big data analytics, real-time tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"International health organizations, governments, global health initiatives"},{"Description":"Disruption of supply chains and global economies","Impact":"Financial instability, production disruption, market volatility","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, digital transformation of business operations","Technologies":"Blockchain, AI, IoT, supply chain management systems","People":"Global business community","Owner":"Businesses, governments, international trade organizations"}]}
